tha-ap394:18.4: Niyyādenti → niyyātenti (bj, pts-vp-pli1) | tuvaṃ → tavaṃ (bj, pts-vp-pli1); tava (sya1ed, sya2ed)
tha-ap394:20.3: Sampattiñhi → sampattī hi (sya1ed, sya2ed, mr); sampattiṃ hi (pts-vp-pli1)
tha-ap394:77.4: patthite vase → āvāse pattite vasse (sya1ed, sya2ed); āvāseva ṭhite vase (mr)
